description.value:
Crafted from polished wood, this seemingly mundane +1 striking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Club] comes with a red leather strap near the handle. The mere sight of the cudgel in a guard's hand fills prisoners with dread.

Good creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying, wielding, or wearing this item crafted by the sea-witches.

Activate 2 Interact (emotion, mental)

Frequency once per day

Effect You initiate an intimidating walk, thumping the cudgel menacingly against your palm. As part of activating this item, you can Stride twice. For the next minute, whenever you successfully Strike a creature with the nightmare cudgel, you can use a free action to attempt an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] the struck creature.
